name: FieldBuilder
description: The `ClassBuilder.FieldBuilder` class is a specialized builder for creating and configuring fields within generated classes. This builder provides a fluent API for setting field visibility, modifiers, initialization values, annotations, and other field properties, allowing you to create comprehensive field definitions.
overview: FieldBuilder instances are obtained through the `addField()` methods of ClassBuilder and support both simple field creation and advanced initialization with complex field initializers. The FieldBuilder provides a comprehensive and flexible API for creating fields with full control over visibility, modifiers, initialization, and annotation metadata, enabling the creation of sophisticated class structures with proper encapsulation and thread safety.

methods.name: makePublic
methods.description: Sets the field visibility to public.

methods.name: makePrivate
methods.description: Sets the field visibility to private.

methods.name: makeProtected
methods.description: Sets the field visibility to protected.

methods.name: makeStatic
methods.description: Makes the field static (class-level rather than instance-level).

methods.name: makeTransient
methods.description: Makes the field transient (excluded from serialization).

methods.name: setInitializer
methods.description: Sets a simple initialization value for the field.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The initialization value (string, number, boolean, null)

methods.name: buildInitializer
methods.description: Creates a FieldInitializerBuilder for complex field initialization.

methods.name: addAnnotation
methods.description: Adds an annotation to the field.

methods.name: end
methods.description: Finalizes the field and returns to the parent ClassBuilder.
